item.title: About
item.description: About # Introduction # Seattle based multi-medium artist & professor. Video Interview #

item.title: Paint
item.description: Paint # New Moon # Price: $1250. Status: Sold. Description: ink and gansai on paper. Framed, 20 x 20 inches. Raindrop #3 # Price: N/A. Status: Sold. Description: Sumi and gansai on paper. Unramed, 7 x 7 inches. Rain and Moss-covered Rock # Price: N/A. Status: Sold. Description: Sumi and gansai on paper. Framed, 10.25 x 27.25 inches. Clouds # Price: N/A. Status: Sold. Description: Sumi and gansai on paper.

item.title: Wood
item.description: Wood # Kokeshi # Prices: $750 Ea. Dolls left & rightmost Sold. Description: Sumi and gansai on wood. January 6, 2021 # Price: $800. Status: For Sale. Description: Sumi and gansai on wood. 12 x 2.5 inches.

item.title: Exhibitions
item.description: Exhibitions # Information If you would like to be notified of upcoming exhibitions, sign up for the mailing list Here. Saint-Briac-Sur-Mer, France. 2024 # Ongoing Event This event is running at LOCATION between the dates 2024-08-08 and 2024-08-14. In collaboration with Chantal Blanchy. Edison, Washington, United States. 2022 # The brush in the medium of sumi only paints lines and dots. Theses strokes evoke the rain, sky, horizons of my paintings.
